options.content:
# Thoth User API Metrics

This dashboard contains all metrics regarding Thoth User API.

## Variables

The variables you can change are described below. For specific overlays they are clustered togheter and you need to set them all to see all metrics belonging to that overlay.

### moc/smaug

- *instance*: `user-api-thoth-frontend-prod.apps.smaug.na.operate-first.cloud`

targets.expr: flask_http_request_duration_seconds_count{field="$instance",  method="GET", status="200"} / ignoring(exported_endpoint) group_left flask_http_request_total{field="$instance", method="GET", status="200"}

flask_http_request_duration_seconds_count{field="$instance", method="POST", status="202"} / ignoring(exported_endpoint) group_left flask_http_request_total{field="$instance", method="POST", status="202"}

flask_http_request_duration_seconds_count{field="$instance", method="POST", status="200"} / ignoring(exported_endpoint) group_left flask_http_request_total{field="$instance", method="POST", status="200"}

rate(flask_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{field="$instance", endpoint!="None", endpoint!="base_url", endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_openapi_json", endpoint!="api_v1", endpoint!="api_readiness",endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_swagger_ui_static", endpoint!="api_liveness",endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_swagger_ui_index", status=~"200|202"}[$interval])
/
rate(flask_http_request_duration_seconds_count{field="$instance",endpoint!="None", endpoint!="base_url", endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_openapi_json", endpoint!="api_v1", endpoint!="api_readiness",endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_swagger_ui_static", endpoint!="api_liveness",endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_swagger_ui_index", status=~"200|202"}[$interval])

increase(flask_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{field="$instance", endpoint!="None", endpoint!="base_url", endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_openapi_json", endpoint!="api_v1", endpoint!="api_readiness",endpoint!="api_liveness",endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_swagger_ui_static", endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_swagger_ui_index", le="0.25", status=~"200|202"}[$interval]) 
/ ignoring (le) increase(flask_http_request_duration_seconds_count{field="$instance", endpoint!="None", endpoint!="base_url", endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_openapi_json", endpoint!="api_v1", endpoint!="api_readiness",endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_swagger_ui_static", endpoint!="api_liveness",endpoint!="/api/v1./api/v1_swagger_ui_index", status=~"200|202"}[$interval])

rate(flask_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{field="$instance", endpoint!="api_v1", endpoint!="base_url", status="200"}[$interval])
/
rate(flask_http_request_duration_seconds_count{field="$instance", endpoint!="api_v1", endpoint!="base_url", status="200"}[$interval])

increase(flask_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{field="$instance", endpoint!="api_v1", endpoint!="base_url", status="200", le="0.25"}[$interval]) 
/ ignoring (le) increase(flask_http_request_duration_seconds_count{field="$instance", endpoint!="api_v1", endpoint!="base_url", status="200"}[$interval])
